In this transferred post, the cause of the friend's mom passing away is attributed to external factors such as access to healthcare and the effectiveness of cancer treatment, rather than internal factors such as not trying hard enough. This shift in attribution style moves the focus from the individual's perceived control to external circumstances beyond their control.
